mapper.insert: INSERT INTO games (game_id, snake_positions, food_position, score) VALUES (#{game_id}, #{snake_positions}, #{food_position}, #{score})
mapper.update: UPDATE games SET snake_positions = #{snake_positions}, food_position = #{food_position}, score = #{score} WHERE game_id = #{game_id}
mapper.select: SELECT game_id, snake_positions, food_position, score FROM games WHERE game_id = #{game_id}
